sentences.sentence: Lights reflected off dust-covered walls creating a ghostly luminescence.
sentences.translation: 灯光照在满是灰尘的墙上，反射回苍白的冷光。

sentences.sentence: Luminescence special point of view, higher prices.
sentences.translation: 特殊的发光角度，价格较高。

sentences.sentence: With good light collection, about 30 % of the luminescence quanta may reach the photocathode.
sentences.translation: 在良好的光收集条件下，约30%的荧光量子可以到达光阴极。
